sources.title: Smart Home Market in Germany
key_findings: The revenue in the Smart Home market is projected to reach US$3,647m in 2024.
The market's largest segment is Control and Connectivity with a projected market volume of US$1,543m in 2024.
sources.usage_note: This data can be used to estimate the total addressable market (TAM) for HappyNest in Germany.

sources.title: Smart Home Market in Europe
key_findings: The Europe smart home market size was valued at USD 15.9 billion in 2024.
The market is expected to grow at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 19.9% from 2021 to 2028.
sources.usage_note: This data can be used to estimate the total addressable market (TAM) for HappyNest in Europe.

assumptions: The smart home market includes digital home solutions like HappyNest.
